name: Jumanji 2: Dark Jumanji
description:
The curse of Jumanji, thrust upon humanity by the ancient Boardlords, has awakened from its long dormancy. Can you overcome the ultimate trials and defeat the curse, or will you fall prey to the evils that lie within JUMANJI 2: DARK JUMANJI™?

-Realistic three dimensional graphics will make you wonder what's really real!

-Incredible artificially intelligent computer characters will put your wits to the test!

-Wow!
